basic_data.human_name: Humble RPG Bundle: Fallout Tabletop Mega Bundle by Modiphius
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Already played every Fallout game? All caught up with the TV show? You can bring the Wasteland right to your living room with this Fallout tabletop roleplaying bundle from Modiphius! You’ll get rulebooks, supplemental materials, and 3D printer files for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, Fallout: Wasteland Warfare, Fallout: Factions, and more—all the ingredients to set up your vision of Fallout’s post-apocalyptic future. Whether you’re a Vault Dweller, a Ghoul, or suited up with the Brotherhood of Steel, you’ll have everything you need to create your own adventure! Every purchase of this bundle at the price of your choice gets you a one-way ticket to the Wasteland and supports the ACLU!
basic_data.description:
Can you survive the Wasteland? Already played every Fallout game? All caught up with the TV show? You can bring the Wasteland right to your living room with this Fallout tabletop roleplaying bundle from Modiphius! You’ll get rulebooks, supplemental materials, and 3D printer files for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, Fallout: Wasteland Warfare, Fallout: Factions, and more—all the ingredients to set up your vision of Fallout’s post-apocalyptic future. Whether you’re a Vault Dweller, a Ghoul, or suited up with the Brotherhood of Steel, you’ll have everything you need to create your own adventure! Every purchase of this bundle at the price of your choice gets you a one-way ticket to the Wasteland and supports the ACLU!

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $1,048. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF and STL formats for 3D printing. PDF's will work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices!. Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here. 

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU). If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

fallout_therpgadventure6_intotheabysspdf.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game - Into the Abyss (PDF)
fallout_therpgadventure6_intotheabysspdf.description_text:
That Sinking Feeling

 

For millennia, the world’s oceans have been the subject of myth and mystery. Creatures unimaginable and treasures uncountable lurk in those frigid depths. Even the great pre-war civilizations understood little of what lay in the darkness below, and now that the world has been destroyed by nuclear fire, the survivors must uncover this knowledge anew.

 

A small group of salvagers has made a career doing just that. Operating under the name Aquatic Antiquities, these salvagers explore the ocean in search of sunken treasures from a bygone age. But the shadow of a terrible curse looms over them, and success has proven elusive. If they want to prevent the business from failing altogether, they need to conduct their most ambitious dive yet—and they need the player characters’ help to do it.

 

Into the Abyss takes place along the coast and focuses primarily on aquatic travel, combat, and underwater exploration.

 

The Into the Abyss PDF features:

 

  • A 26-page adventure in three acts for character levels 8-12.

  • Meet the underwater salvagers and learn about a local legend!

  • Learn to dive and uncover pre-war diving technology!

  • Explore a sunken battleship and encounter a legendary beast!

 

© 2024 Bethesda Softworks LLC, FALLOUT and related logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of ZeniMax Media Inc. or its affiliates in the U.S. and/or other countries. All Rights Reserved.

 

DRTPG: 

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/502325

fallout2d20adventure4_huntedpdf.description_text:
Hunter or Prey?

Traveling the wasteland comes with many hazards, some of which are not entirely of this world. In this digital adventure for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, you will face one such otherworldly threat.

 

A storm forces you to take shelter in a location held by Raiders but, before the storm can pass, events go from bad to worse as a terrifying creature makes its lethal presence known. Tracking the unusual predator to a nearby Atomatoys factory brings you into contact with a gang of brutish Super Mutants who have also suffered attacks from the same creature. The climax of the quest is a deadly game of cat-and-mouse through the factory as you hunt the creature to ultimately decide which is the predator and which is the prey.

 

The Hunted PDF features:

 

  • A 17-page adventure in three acts for character levels 11-16.

  • Negotiate with Raiders and Super Mutants!

  • Investigate the abandoned Atomatoys Factory!

  • Hunt (and be hunted by) a strange and deadly creature!

 

This PDF requires the core rules found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook but could be played using the rules and pregen characters found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Starter Set.

 

© 2024 Bethesda Softworks LLC, FALLOUT and related logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of ZeniMax Media Inc. or its affiliates in the U.S. and/or other countries. All Rights Reserved.

 

DTRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/471561

fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Terrain Expansion: Preserved Red Rocket - STL
fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.description_text:
Red Rocket stops were an iconic feature of pre-war life in the United States, evolving from simple gas filling stations to offer a wide range of services including fusion and coolant refilling services, following the widespread adoption of these technologies in 2066.

Strangely, this surviving example seems to have been preserved in its entirety, its roof and walls still standing as if untouched by the ravages of time and life in the wasteland. Who knows what lurks inside its gleaming exterior, valuable resources like food, chemicals or stims, or perhaps an ambush from denizens that do not wish to be disturbed? Its story is yours to tell, in this intriguing new 3D printed terrain feature.

Please see images for further details: this 3D print file contains STLs for the following:

Red Rocket Front Window Inner Corner x 2 Inner Wall x 2 Left Wall x 2 Optional Shop Front Right Wall x 2 Rocket Rocket Girder x 2 Roof x 8 Signage x 2

Dressing Cart Diagnostic Cart Gas Pump Tool Chest Tool Rack Workshop Cabinet x 4

Please note: this is an STL ONLY for 3D printing and not the physical product. Requires a 3D printer and knowledge of 3D printing to use.

Our reference consumer grade 3D printer is the Form 2 SLA (Stereolighotgraphy Apparatus) resin 3D printer by Formlabs.

Our Bounding Box Benchmark is 220mm x 220mm This product requires a maximum build size of Roof 'E' L174.74mm W61.73mm 323.01mm

The recommended print resolution is 25 microns, though users may find the 50 microns setting may be acceptable for some larger objects. Lower resolutions are not recommended.

The Form 2 printer has a maximum build size of 145 (L) x 145 (W) x 175 (H) mm.

3D printable file and model ©2020 Bethesda Softworks, a ZeniMax Media company. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that all content is subject to trademark ® and copyright © protection of the brand named above. - STL files are sold on an ""as-is"" basis only, we do not accept modification requests and printing and technical support is not provided. - 3D Printable files have strictly non-commercial, non-distribution licenses and shall be downloaded for personal use only. - The customer may not share, distribute, sell, rent, sub-license, host or transfer the 3D printable file. - The customer may not 3D print these files for commercial or mass production purpose. - 3D printable files maybe downloaded for personal only and may not be used for marketing, collecting money, fees, donations, reimbursement or any purposes of remuneration: Including but not limited to selling 3D prints, posting content on Ebay, Etsy, Shapeways, Facebook, store or any other product or file sharing or distribution site or service. - Any violation is subject to legal enforcement of intellectual property rights to the fullest extent of the law, including criminal prosecution.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_accessories_hom.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Accessories: Homestead Rules Expansion PDF
fallout_wastelandwarfare_accessories_hom.description_text:
The Wasteland is rife with many dangers for the unwary, and few of those that travel through its deadly expanse tend to stray far from the nearest shelter. For though the great cities of the United States now lie in ruin, there are numerous settlements scattered throughout the Wasteland, built upon the ashes of what once stood before.

 

Those that dwell within such structures rely upon the remnants of old buildings and what scraps they can find to construct defenses against the Wasteland’s predators. Such places are also dependent on supplies of food and water, for the greater the number of people within a settlement, the greater the demand for resources. Though there is safety in numbers, the settlements within the Wasteland make tempting targets for those looking for a haven of their own.

 

Homestead is an expansion to the Fallout Wasteland Warfare Settlement mode and allows players to fully map out their base of operations within the Wasteland. Set up your starting Settlement and expand upon it by constructing new buildings and defenses. As your Settlement develops, you’ll need to manage the resources that you have available to provide water and power to the structures within.

 

Within this digital packet, you’ll find new Explore and Event cards with a theme of protecting your Settlement and focus on making it grow and thrive within a hostile Wasteland. The expansion also includes a Survival mode that allows players to create a roster of units representing the inhabitants of their Settlement. In Survival mode, the damage the units take is carried over from one game to the next, along with new rules for determining the fate of your units that are injured in battle.

 

In addition, Homestead includes a new scenario for defending your Settlement against attacks from enemy factions as well as new rules for recording damage and repairs to the Settlement’s buildings and Defenses.

 

This digital expansion includes:

 

  • A booklet with the rules needed to play the Homestead expansion to the standard Settlement mode of Fallout: Wasteland Warfare

  • New scenarios for fighting battles within your own Wasteland Settlement

  • Rules for the Settlement Survival Mode

  • 79 new printable cards for the Settlement mode expansion

  • A Survival Mode Roster

  • A Settlement Layout Grid

 

© 2022 Bethesda Softworks LLC, a ZeniMax Media company. FALLOUT®, BETHESDA and related logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of ZeniMax Media Inc. or its affiliates in the U.S. and/or other countries. All Rights Reserved.

 

DRTPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/413293

developers.developer-name: James Sheahan, Jono Green, Ethan Heywood, Giles Nevill, Charlie Perkins, Kieran Street

fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.description_text:
Friend, where will you be when the bombs fall? Better still, where will others be? Secure their future the way you want with a state-of-the-art underground vault from Vault-Tec! You have been chosen as the designer of this critical structure, and with the Vault Design Starter Pack you’ll have all you need to prepare your Vault Dwellers for the coming devastation. Will you create spacious avenues and living spaces for the survivors to-be, or will you further the causes of science by limiting access to unnecessary luxuries such as food, water, and oxygen?

 

Build your own Vault-Tec Vault with the STL design files, ready to be the background for epic and immersive games of Fallout: Wasteland Warfare and its RPG Expansion. This Vault Design Starter Pack includes files for [the Classic Vault door and generator], [Vault supports],[detailed Vault walls], [Interior Vault Door],  all ready for 3D printing, giving players huge amounts of versatility and variation to build their own vault.

fallout_terrain_printathome_commercialve.human_name: Fallout: Terrain - Print at Home - Commercial Vehicles
fallout_terrain_printathome_commercialve.description_text:
At Atomic Motors, we understand that in these challenging times, your vehicle is more than just a means of transportation - it’s a lifeline. That’s why we offer only the best in automotive technology. Come down to Atomic Motors today and find the perfect vehicle to conquer your transit troubles. Your journey to a brighter tomorrow starts with Atomic Motors!

 

Travel in style with single-seater powerhouses like this fabulous minicar - built for efficiency and endurance on our busy suburban roads. Or turn your attention to the Fusion Flea - the perfect blend of compact size and nuclear-powered performance! With their lightweight frames and agile handling, you’ll be darting through downtown Boston or navigating the winding roads of Appalachia and be home in time for dinner! More adventurous customers might like to feel the wind in their hair by choosing the aptly named Lone Wanderer motorcycle as their atomic steed - its powerful engine and reinforced tyres ensure that no journey is too daunting. 

 

If you’re looking for something roomier without sacrificing style, look no further than the classic station wagon - the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern necessity! Featuring genuine leather seats and a built-in holotape player, the station wagon ensures that you will travel together in luxury, enjoying panoramic views of the beautiful all-American countryside thanks to the elegant transparent domed roof.

 

Finally, for business customers who need to transport precious cargo of all kinds, you can’t go wrong with this spacious and versatile Vault-Tec Van. Combining safety, space, and durability, it’s more than just a vehicle - it’s a moving bastion of security and peace-of-mind in today’s busy modern world.

 

Thank you for considering Atomic Motors, we’ll ensure that you can ride in style, even when it feels like the world is on fire!

 

This 3D print product lets you print five different pre-war commercial vehicles, to use as scatter terrain on your tabletop.

 

Files have been pre-hollowed where possible, and all files include supported versions for easier printing.

 

Contents:

 

  • Fusion Flea

  • Minicar

  • Motorcycle

  • Station Wagon

  • Vault-Tec Van

 

DRTPG: 

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/487290

fallout_wastelandwarfare_rpg_theunexpect.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG - The Unexpected Shepherd - PDF
fallout_wastelandwarfare_rpg_theunexpect.description_text:
PROTECTION ORDER - PART 1

 

This is a 36 page Solo adventure PDF for the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG Expansion. You will receive the PDF immediately on purchase.

 

Delve into the Wasteland with the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG’s Solo missions! The Unexpected Shepherd part one is the first on the list. Take on the foes and threats that the world of Fallout throws at you, where your decisions make a difference and the outcome is all up to you. 

 

Called to Century – a grimy trading outpost housed within and around a tangle of 100 shipping containers – you are answering the call for assistance from an old friend.

 

Using a choose-a-path style adventure system, you get to make choices, make skill tests and decide the outcome.  The Unexpected Shepherd also uses special game mechanics to remember some of your actions so they may have consequences later, as well as track time; plus, you can play major encounters using models on the table using Fallout: Wasteland Warfare’s AI system to control the non-player characters.

 

©2020 Bethesda Softworks, a ZeniMax Media company. All Rights Reserved.

 

DRTPG: 

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/328379

fallout_wastelandwarfarenukacolagirlscen.description_text: This fun, two-page scenario pits the heroic Nuka-Girl against an opponent’s forces, while filming a commercial for Nuka-Cola Quantum!

fallout_wasteland_warfare_printathome_se.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Print At Home - Settlement Walls
fallout_wasteland_warfare_printathome_se.description_text:
Every self-respecting wastelander needs somewhere to call home, and what is a home without walls made of repurposed junk? It’s the best that most can manage, but at least the tires, planks, corrugated metal, and whatever garbage they can find might keep the worst of the irradiated vermin out for a time. Inevitably, most such defenses see conflict of some kind, and it’s testament to the versatility (and foolishness?) of wastelanders that they continue to trust their safety to the refuse of the past. 

 

This 3D print product lets you print multiple themed pieces of terrain to create settlement boundaries and defensible positions across the wasteland. The set includes three variations of spiked barriers, four junk walls, a door, and a gate. Whether Raiders or Super Mutants, these defenses should keep you safe until the next Vault survivor  bursts in looking for caps.

 

Files have been pre-hollowed where possible, and all files include supported versions for easier printing.

 

Contents 

 

  • Spiked Barrier 1

  • Spiked Barrier 2

  • Spiked Barrier 3

  • Wall 1

  • Wall 2

  • Wall Corner

  • Wall Curved

  • Wall Door

  • Wall Gate

fallout_wastelandwarfare_campaignbookpdf.description_text:
In Fallout: Wasteland Warfare players build their own crew from a wide range of factions, allies and iconic characters from the Fallout series, and play in post-apocalyptic games of 3 - 30 high quality 32mm scale miniatures through a huge variety of iconic scenery and settlement buildings, from the Red Rocket to Sanctuary Hills, Nuka-Cola vending machines and wrecked cars. 

 

This PDF of the Campaign rules for Fallout: Wasteland Warfare expands the core gameplay to include a wider narrative, more player options and the real essence of living and surviving in the wasteland, including:

 

 - Events, boosts, quests and perks for your faction that add new layers of narrative play and challenge to your experience.

 

 - Solo / AI play, letting players go head to head with the wasteland itself. This includes specific AI scenarios and full rules for using AI in the game.

 

 - Settlement Mode for all other modes of play, allowing you to build up a personal fortress or ramshackle village to your own specifications. This mode also gives players the rules for how your evolving settlement will interact with the games you play, the forces you can take and how your victories or defeats affect your homestead.

 

 - A list of linked tutorial scenarios that take players from the start of the Core Rule book to being able to take on anything the wasteland can throw at you.

 

-  Please note the download does not include the AI, Quest, Event, Boosts and Perks cards - these are only available in print in the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare Two Player Starter Set available in retail or from Modiphius. 

 

This PDF  is complemented with the Core Rulebook PDF and the ‘Getting Acclimated’ learning to play guide.

developers.developer-name: James Sheahan, Mark Latham, Jon Webb, James Barry, Federico Sohns

fallout2d20_npcpack1_therustdevils.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game: NPC Pack 1 - The Rust Devils (PDF)
fallout2d20_npcpack1_therustdevils.description_text:
A Taste For Technology and the Smarts to Use It

 

The Rust Devils are a gang of ruthless and tech-savvy raiders who are obsessed with robots. They scour the Commonwealth looking for robots to reprogram or salvage, festooning themselves and their bases with tangles of wires, circuitry, and spare parts–even going so far as to fashion armor and weapons from the robot parts they salvage. You may only encounter a few human gang members at a time while out in the Wasteland, but rest assured their reprogrammed and deadly robots will never be far away!

 

This digital NPC Theme Pack for Fallout The Roleplaying Game is designed to give gamemasters all the necessary rules, stats, and tools to inject the Rust Devils raider gang into their games at any level of play.

 

The 39-page Rust Devils PDF features:

 

  • Stat blocks for 22 Rust Devil NPCs and heavily modified robots, over a variety of levels from the Level 2 Rust Devil Scrounger or Protectron Devil all the way up to their leader Ivey and the terrifying Level 18 Sentry Bot Butcher!

  • The Rust Devils’ background and motivations, plus tips on their combat tactics and encounters.

  • New Equipment and Gear, including Robot Armor, and stats for using an Assaultron Head as a hand-held laser, or a Mister Handy Buzz Blade as a melee weapon.

  • Rust Devil random encounters and a Level 12 home base location at the Fort Hagen Satellite Array.

fallout_wastelandWarfare_PAH_toys_bobble.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Print at Home - Toys and Bobbleheads STL
fallout_wastelandWarfare_PAH_toys_bobble.description_text:
The Vault-Tec Corporation was responsible for many wondrous technological and scientific achievements. The Vaults themselves are astonishing, but you sometimes hear strange stories coming out of the Wasteland about bizarre side effects from their products and tech. For example, I’ve heard it said that even their Vault Boy bobbleheads could impart some miraculous personal boost, but only rare individuals seem to benefit. It’s probably all nonsense, just one more tall tale coming out of the big pile of crazy that is the Wasteland, but it’s certainly not the wildest story that folks tell about Vault-Tec, that’s for sure!

 

If you spend any time in the Wasteland you might discover some of those old Vaults and countless abandoned homes filled with memories and junk. Some of that junk might be nice as poignant reminders of happier times, but mostly it’s just good for scrap. It’s testament to the prewar corporations that they could build products so durable that even childrens’ toys survive almost 200 years later. If they’re that tough, you can definitely find a use for rockets, racecars, and robot horses! Once I collect enough, I’ve got plans to make an armoured coat out of toy parts - I’ll be indestructible!

 

This 3D print product lets you print multiple pieces of scatter to help create immersive tabletop scenes. They could also be used as objective markers or loot. These items are ubiquitous across the wasteland and could be found anywhere! All bobbleheads come in two versions - one with the Vault 76 logo, the other with the Vault 111 logo.

 

Files have been pre-hollowed where possible, and all files include supported versions for easier printing.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_rpg_scenario1_m.description_text:
Grab your crew and head out into the wasteland in Machine Frequency, a Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG for 3-5 players. A Brotherhood of Steal Scribe need your help – will you leave him for dead or take up the cause? fallout_wastelandwarfare_unexpectedsheph.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - The Unexpected Shepherd Part 3 PDF
fallout_wastelandwarfare_unexpectedsheph.description_text:
PART 3: BATTLE STATION

 

This is a 41-page Solo adventure PDF for the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG Expansion. You will receive the PDF immediately on purchase.

 

Delve into the Wasteland with the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG’s Solo missions! This is the third and final part of the adventure, and you must have played the first two parts to continue your character’s adventure. The decisions you made previously continue to matter through part 3, but the outcome is still up to you.

 

The final leg of this adventure begins where part 2 ended, as some surprising revelations force you to face more tough decisions. Your choices and actions will decide how successful you are in reaching the conclusion of the Unexpected Shepherd missions and surviving everything the Wasteland puts in your way.

 

Using a choose-a-path style adventure system, you get to make choices, make skill tests and decide the outcome.  The Unexpected Shepherd also uses special game mechanics to remember some of your actions so they may have consequences later, as well as track time; plus, you can play major encounters using models on the table using Fallout: Wasteland Warfare’s AI system to control the non-player characters.

 

For more details on The Unexpected Shepherd project, check out our Part 1 blog about the exciting features it contains.

 

To play The Unexpected Shepherd you will require access to the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG Expansion.

 

©2022 Bethesda Softworks, a ZeniMax Media company. All Rights Reserved.

fallout_terrain_industrialvehiclesstl.human_name: Fallout: Terrain - Print at Home - Industrial Vehicles (STL)
fallout_terrain_industrialvehiclesstl.description_text:
The Vault-Tec Industrial Megaloader XL-9000 is the ultimate solution for all your heavy-duty lifting needs. Engineered with pre-war precision and durability, this powerful machine is capable of lifting and loading raw material with ease. Whether you’re rebuilding civilization from the ground up or managing the demanding tasks of a thriving vault, the XL-9000’s hydraulic exoskeleton and nuclear-powered drive ensure unmatched power and efficiency. Take control of your world with the Megaloader XL-9000 – because in these times, heavy lifting isn’t just a job, it’s a necessity.

 

Say goodbye to the grunt work and hello to seamless productivity with the Poseidon Forklift 1200. This versatile industrial vehicle is designed to navigate the tight spaces of warehouses, factories, and vault storage facilities with pinpoint precision. Powered by a microfusion cell, the Poseidon Forklift 1200 is your compact-yet-powerful solution for stacking, moving, and organising your base of operations in the post-apocalyptic world.

 

Revitalize your agricultural efforts with the General Atomics AgroTrac 5000. This biofuel-powered tractor is the all-in-one farming machine of tomorrow, today. Its rust-proof, radiation-resistant chassis ensures long-lasting performance, even in the harshest environments. Whether you’re cultivating crops for your settlement or producing valuable biomatter for demanding scientists, the AgroTrac 5000 is built to maximize your yield and minimize your labor. With the AgroTrac, you’re not just farming, you’re securing the future.

 

In the post-war world, sanitation is more than just cleanliness, it’s survival. The Deluxe brand E-Z SAN Street Cleaner is engineered to keep your communal spaces spotless, ensuring a healthier environment for all. With its integrated waste compactor, the E-Z SAN efficiently takes care of dirt and radioactive particles, while its compact design means it can maneuver through narrow or crowded spaces with ease. Built with the same dedication to safety and quality that Deluxe products are known for, the E-Z SAN Street Cleaner is your first line of defense against weird sludge and grime of all kinds.

 

This 3D print product lets you print four different pre-war industrial vehicles, to use as scatter terrain on your tabletop.

 

Files have been pre-hollowed where possible, and all files include supported versions for easier printing.

 

Contents:

 

  • Megaloader

  • Forklift

  • Tractor

  • Street Cleaner

fallout_the_roleplaying_game_coreruleboo.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook PDF
fallout_the_roleplaying_game_coreruleboo.description_text:
In 2077, the storm of nuclear war reduced most of the planet to cinders. From the ashes of nuclear devastation, a new civilization will struggle to arise. A civilization you will shape.

 

How will you re-shape the world? Will you join with a plucky band of survivors to fight off all-comers and carve out your own settlement? Will you team up with pre-existing factions like the Brotherhood of Steel or Super Mutants to enforce your own ideals on the Wasteland? Ghoul or robot, paladin or raider, it’s your choice - and the consequences are yours. Welcome to the Wasteland. Welcome to the world of Fallout.

 

This DIGITAL COPY of our 438-page rulebook contains rules and lore for roleplaying in the Fallout world, as well as concept art from the Fallout videogames. Utilizing Modiphius’ celebrated 2d20 cinematic role-playing system, the Fallout RPG will take players on an exciting journey into the post-apocalypse!

 

Create your own survivors, super mutants, ghouls, and even Mister Handy robots. Immerse yourselves in the iconic post-nuclear apocalyptic world of Fallout, while gamemasters guide their group through unique stories and encounters. The 2d20 edition of Fallout is as close to the bottlecap bartering, wasteland wandering, Brotherhood battling excitement as you can get.

 

  • Immerse yourself in this genre-defining setting with the official Fallout™ tabletop roleplaying game.

  • Create your group of original characters including vault dwellers, ghouls, super mutants, and even robots. Tell your own stories of survival in post-nuclear America using a host of non-playable characters and horrific mutated creatures.

  • Use iconic weapons, armor, chems, and items transferred straight from the video game. Scavenge the ruins of the old world and make your mark on the Wasteland.

  • Utilize the 2d20 System - a roleplaying rules set that supports both story-led adventures and detailed gameplay. Use Action Points to power your incredible wasteland wanderers, and augment their actions with your fantastic Perks.

  • Use an extensive catalogue of creatures and characters from the world of Fallout.

  • Gamemasters can kick things off with story hooks immersed in the Fallout universe, roll and build random encounters from tables inside the book, and even randomly generate locations and loot for their players.

  • 'With a Bang or a Whimper' 18 page introductory adventure

fallout_theroleplayinggamesettlersguideb.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Settler's Guide Book (PDF)
fallout_theroleplayinggamesettlersguideb.description_text:
Gather your companions and build your settlement.

 

Across the wasteland of America, pockets of survivors have built new communities amongst the ruins of the old. Now, the Settler’s Guide Book for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game gives you all the tools you need to build your own settlements and expand your games in new ways, including a host of player options and equipment, companions, automatrons, factions, and guidance for the gamemaster.

 

The Settler’s Guide Book PDF includes a huge amount of content for both players and gamemasters. Whether you’re building settlements, encountering factions, or just want some new companions and side arms, this book has something for everyone! There’s no place like home, but this guide is the next best thing!

 

Within the 192-page PDF Settler’s Guide Book you will:

 

  • Create new characters from brand new origins, including the Commonwealth Minutemen, New California Republic, robots, and more!

  • Build your own settlements and manage your settlers! Build housing, shore up defenses, and grow a thriving community.

  • Make friends with your own trusty companions. Have new dog breeds, robots, or even faithful human and mutant allies follow you through the wasteland.

  • Build your own automatrons! Mix and match your robot parts to make unique mechanical companions.

  • Unleash an arsenal of weapons on your enemies and expand your armory with even more small guns, big guns, and energy weapons from across the wasteland, and modify them more than ever before.

  • Learn more about the different factions you’ll encounter, and meet a host of new wastelanders from both the East and West coasts with full stat blocks included!

 

This PDF requires the core rules found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook.

 

© 1997-2023 Bethesda Softworks LLC, a ZeniMax Media company. fallout_wastelandwarfare_caughtinthecros.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Caught in the Crossfire Campaign book
fallout_wastelandwarfare_caughtinthecros.description_text:
Things are changing in the wasteland. Heavy weapons are being brought to bear, factions are clashing over military installations, and below ground a desperate action is being taken in a struggle to survive. Creaking factories are raided for scrap, leaking tankers stage running gun battles, and Pre-war weapons and contraptions are hastily patched up. There’s a storm coming, the whole wasteland can feel it. Will you be ready when it arrives…or will you be Caught in the Crossfire?

 

Enhance your battlegrounds with suggested settings and terrain types, and play linked missions or enjoy stand alone scenarios as seen on Twitch.

 

Contains:

 

-          Nine linked scenarios in a narrative campaign.

 

-          Three new streamed scenarios from the Modiphius live steams on Twitch.

 

-          Scenery guides for suggested areas to play in and use.

pdffallout_theroleplayinggamestarterset.description_text:
Welcome to the Wasteland

 

Immerse yourself in the genre-defining setting with this introduction to the official Fallout tabletop roleplaying game. This starter set gets you playing Fallout using the 2d20 System designed and tailored for an authentic wasteland experience. Roleplay as a unique character in the familiar setting of the Commonwealth around Boston.

 

This starter set digital product contains almost everything you need to begin playing Fallout: The Tabletop Roleplaying Game - just add dice and something to use for tokens!

 

  • A 56-page rulebook containing all core rules, perks, and equipment needed to explore the wasteland.

  • A 60-page quest book Once Upon a Time in the Wasteland taking your characters on an exciting quest around the nuclear-ravaged wasteland outside Boston.

  • 6 pre-generated characters to choose from, including ghouls, super mutants, and even a Mister Handy robot.

fallout_theroleplayinggame_winterofatomb.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game: Winter of Atom PDF
fallout_theroleplayinggame_winterofatomb.description_text:
Immerse yourself in a whiteout nuclear winter in the first quest book for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game.

 

In the ruins of old Boston, the Commonwealth settles in for a long, deadly winter. As its hungry communities do their best to find food and survive the cold, a new sect of the Church of the Children of Atom arrives. Their flock grows as they spread their worship of nuclear division and radiation across the region. Led by an enigmatic prophet calling himself the Last Son of Atom, the Church’s army plans to ignite an all-out winter war with the settlements that dare reject their atomic god. A group of ragtag survivors must do whatever it takes to protect their communities and keep the Commonwealth from becoming ground zero… again.

 

Winter of Atom’s themes include exploring frozen wastelands, harsh winter survival, building relationships with communities, explosive action against terrifying monsters, high-stakes warfare against a relentless foe, and weird and unexplainable supernatural horrors.

 

Within the 248-page Winter of Atom quest book PDF you will:

 

  • Face a fearsome sect of the Children of Atom, led by the Last Son of Atom, in an action-packed, open-ended and non-linear sandbox questline that can take characters from level 1 - 21.

  • Meet brand new groups of survivors, from beatniks and circus big tops, to traveling casinos and religious weaponsmiths.

  • Create characters with new origin options: Generation 3 Synths, Protectrons, and Children of Atom.

  • Enhance your game with new rules for surviving the harsh winter and gaining reputation with settlements. Learn how to design balanced combat encounters, and find new rules for surviving defeat, quickly adjusting an encounter’s difficulty, and creating Minion NPCs.

 

This PDF requires the core rules found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook but could be played using the rules and pregen characters found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Starter Set.

fallout_theroleplayinggame_gmscreenplusb.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game - GM Screen + Booklet PDF
fallout_theroleplayinggame_gmscreenplusb.description_text:
Master the Wastelands!

 

This digital Gamemaster’s Screen features evocative Fallout art on the exterior and a host of handy tables on the inside. Tables include: Action Points in Combat, Hit Locations, Weapon Qualities and Range Difficulties, Damage Effects, Injuries and Critical Hits, Minor and Major Actions, Hunger and Thirst States.

 

Also included is a 20-page PDF booklet that brings together the scavenging rules and guidance from the Core Rulebook and the GM's Toolkit in one handy resource that presents comprehensive guidelines on creating scavenging scenes and locations, and ways to generate the loot that players can find there.

 

  • Have handy tables for all manner of rules and statistics for exploring the wasteland.

  • Provide your players with scavenging locations tailored to their quests.

  • Guide them through scavenging scenes, from heavily searched ruins to untouched gems.

  • Populate your scavenging scenes with inhabitants both hostile and friendly.

  • Don’t make it easy! Place obstacles and hazards in their way to the valuable loot inside.

fallout2d20_npcpack2_enclaveremnantspdf.description_text:
Taking Another Shot At Glory

 

When the Enclave fell to the New California Republic (NCR), some of their forces managed to get away while the Navarro military base was being sacked. Since then, life has been hard, living under the NCR’s thumb, constantly worried that their identities will be uncovered and their lives once again uprooted.

 

Though the term “Enclave remnant” can refer to a range of people, there is a particular group of Enclave veterans who now live in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281. These individuals are lying low and keeping their heads down, it would take a concerted effort to find them and their secret bunker filled with their stash of Enclave gear.

 

This digital NPC Theme Pack for Fallout The Roleplaying Game is designed to give gamemasters all the necessary rules, stats, and tools to introduce these Enclave Remnants into their games at any level of play. Use the information within to present these NPCs as potential allies, build a quest about bringing the old gang back together, or perhaps use them as well-rounded enemies defending their secrets and hidden bunker. 

 

The 25-page Enclave Remnants PDF features:

 

  • Stat blocks and backgrounds for 6 named Enclave Remnant NPCs, with stats provided for two different Levels of play, including Heavy Weapons Trooper Orion Moreno, and Vertibird Pilot Daisy Whitman.

  • The group’s background and motivations, plus tips on their combat tactics and suggestions for mustering these troops to help or hinder your PCs.

  • 6 Plot Seeds to introduce the Enclave Remnants into your games.

  • A detailed write-up of the Remnants’ Bunker, with loot and clearance rewards.

  • An overview of piloting a vertibird, including the different roles and actions characters can take. Plus a rundown on the specifics of the vertibird’s profile.

 

© 2024 ZeniMax Media Inc. All Rights Reserved.

fallout_theRPG_orangecolored_sky.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game - Orange Coloured Sky PDF
fallout_theRPG_orangecolored_sky.description_text:
The Road to Hell is Paved With Good Intentions

In this PDF quest for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, a group of doctors and other caregivers have established a clinic in “Mt. Sin Central,” an ancient hospital in the middle of a ruined city. They offer treatment for ailments of all sorts and Mt. Sin has recently received an influx of chem-addicts who are resistant to the usual forms of medical intervention. The problem is becoming more widespread and the already overworked hospital staff are running on fumes while their supplies are rapidly dwindling. Moreover, the chems involved seem to originate within the territory of a raider gang, which makes fixing the problem even more difficult. The Board of Caregivers have sent out a distress call via Mt. Sin’s Emergency Broadcast beacon. Will you answer their desperate pleas for help?

The Orange Colored Sky PDF features:

  • A 22-page adventure in three acts for character levels 6-10.
  • A hospital full of medics and patients in need of help.
  • Locations to explore within the hospital itself and in the surrounding area.
  • Can be placed in any urban landscape in your own games.

 

© 1997-2023 Bethesda Softworks LLC, a ZeniMax Media company. fallout2d20_npcpack4_mariposamilitarybas.human_name: Fallout 2d20: NPC Pack 4 - Mariposa Military Base (PDF)
fallout2d20_npcpack4_mariposamilitarybas.description_text:
You are Super Mutant. I am Super Mutant. We are all… Super Mutant.

 

Mariposa Military Base has a long and secretive history. It was here that the Forced Evolutionary Virus (FEV) was tested on human subjects before the Great War. Here, the unsuspecting Dr. Grey became the Master, and created the Super Mutant strain that would form the Unity. Later, the Enclave cracked open Mariposa to recover a sample of pure FEV for their own ends. Their excavations came to a violent end, however, as miners forced into servitude mutated and revolted against their captors. Led by Melchior the Magnificent, armed with both stolen weapons and the new-found strength of their mutant forms, they overcame the Enclave forces. Now, the base stands seemingly deserted…

 

This digital NPC Theme Pack for Fallout The Roleplaying Game is designed to give gamemasters all the necessary rules, stats, and tools to introduce the Mariposa Military Base and its denizens into their games. The locations and enemies included are intended to go up against characters of Levels 7-9 but you can, of course, modify them and the content of this PDF to suit your own game.

 

This pack offers a great set-up for an old-fashioned dungeon crawl, with the player characters on a journey of discovery, hunting for old world technology and information. But this themed toolbox of stat blocks, locations, and equipment can be tailored any number of ways to suit the tone and feel of your game.

 

The 32-page Mariposa Military Base PDF features:

 

  • 11 stat blocks including several new Super Mutants, along with mutated creatures, and a Ravenous Deathclaw.

  • Information on the history and personality of the base’s Super Mutants and their leader.

  • Plot Seeds that suggest what might become of the Military Base after the player characters have cleared it.

  • A detailed write-up of the Mariposa Military Base itself, with obstacles, threat, and loot found in several key locations.

  • New equipment, including weapons, mods, explosives, and irradiated food.

 

© 2025 ZeniMax Media Inc. All Rights Reserved.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Terrain Expansion: Ruined Red Rocket - STL
fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.description_text:
Red Rocket stops were an iconic feature of pre-war life in the United States, evolving from simple gas filling stations to offer a wide range of services including fusion and coolant refilling services, following the widespread adoption of these technologies in 2066.

Sadly, this surviving example has fallen on hard times, it’s walls ailing, its roof caved in, worn down and fallen into disrepair by the passage of time and the depravations of life in the wasteland. Who knows what lurks inside its shabby exterior, valuable resources like food, chemicals or stims, or perhaps an ambush from denizens that do not wish to be disturbed? Its story is yours to tell, in this intriguing new 3D printed terrain feature.

Please see images for further details: this 3D print file contains STLs for the following:

Outer Corner Ruined Canopy Ruined Door Frame Ruined Door Wall Ruined Double Junction Ruined Inner Corner Ruined Inner Wall Ruined Rocket Ruined Rocket Girder Ruined Rubble A Ruined Rubble B Ruined Signage Ruined Single Junction Wall Ruined Small Wall Ruined Window

Please note: this is an STL ONLY for 3D printing and not the physical product. Requires a 3D printer and knowledge of 3D printing to use.

Our reference consumer grade 3D printer is the Form 2 SLA (Stereolighotgraphy Apparatus) resin 3D printer by Formlabs.

Our Bounding Box Benchmark is 220mm x 220mm This product requires a maximum build size of Ruined Rocket Girder L208.86mm W63.70mm H65.03mm

The recommended print resolution is 25 microns, though users may find the 50 microns setting may be acceptable for some larger objects. Lower resolutions are not recommended.

The Form 2 printer has a maximum build size of 145 (L) x 145 (W) x 175 (H) mm.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Terrain Expansion: Vault Flooring Pack STL
fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.description_text:
Friend, where will you and your loved ones be when the bombs fall? Secure their future the way you want with a state-of-the-art underground vault from Vault-Tec!

 

You have been chosen as the designer of this critical structure, and with this upgrade pack you’ll have all you need to expand your vault with new options for flooring and tile options which build on the existing Vault Design Starter Pack and Vault Walls Upgrade Pack, Atrium Pack, Office Bundle amd Vault Themed Dressing/Scatter.

 

Will you create spacious avenues and living spaces for the survivors to-be, or will you further the causes of science by limiting access to unnecessary luxuries such as food, water, and oxygen?

 

Build your own Vault-Tec Vault with the STL design files, ready to be the background for epic and immersive games of Fallout: Wasteland Warfare and its RPG Expansion. This Vault Interior Thremed Dressing Scatter Pack includes files for all manner of furniture and accessories including floor tiles, hatches, and even traffic cones giving players huge amounts of versatility and variation to build their own vault.

Fallout_wastelandwarfare_PAH_chems_meds_.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Print at Home - Chems, Meds and Food STL
Fallout_wastelandwarfare_PAH_chems_meds_.description_text:
When you’re looting the next abandoned ruin, keep an eye out for cans, chems, and anything even remotely edible. The Wasteland is an unforgiving place, and nobody survives long without knowing what’s good and what’s deadly.

 

You’re going to need to find, steal, or harvest your own food, and most of that will be irradiated - even the stuff you need to stay alive could kill you. So you’ll need to find a good source of meds and chems too, but everyone is looking for those - you’ll be competing with Psychos and Scavvers for Buffout, Mentats, Psycho, and Jet, so make sure you take your rifle to the store.

 

Most pre-war canned food went bad years ago, but there’s some that seem able to survive anything, like tins of Cram processed meat, and BlamCo mac & cheese. The wasteland sometimes provides new food too - stuff like Brain Fungus, Mothman Eggs, and Mutfruit. Of course, most of those are heavy on the rads, so you’d better stock up on RadAway for dessert. 

 

Basically everything could kill you, except the stuff that might not. My advice? Never leave a medkit behind, keep your eyes open and your belly full, and maybe you’ll live long enough to run into the muties and brain-eaters, but then you’re on your own.

 

This 3D print product lets you print multiple pieces of scatter to help create immersive tabletop scenes. They could also be used as objective markers or loot. These items are ubiquitous across the wasteland and could be found anywhere!

 

Files have been pre-hollowed where possible, and all files include supported versions for easier printing.

pdffallout_therpgadventure3_showdowninsk.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Adventure - Showdown in Skull Canyon (PDF)
pdffallout_therpgadventure3_showdowninsk.description_text:
The mutants living in Skull Canyon have always flown under the radar–until now. In this adventure for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, the player characters are drawn into a conflict between the New California Republic Rangers and the seemingly peaceful mutants of Skull Canyon. Unusual activity in the area has raised the Rangers’ suspicions, and the mutants may not be quite what anyone expects. As the PCs navigate the challenges of exploring the canyon, battling mutant rattlesnakes, conducting diplomatic talks, and deciding how they deal with moral questions, they will have to weigh the consequences of their actions and ultimately decide the fate of Skull Canyon’s unusual inhabitants.

 

The Showdown in Skull Canyon PDF features:

 

  • A 28-page adventure in three acts for character levels 1-5. 

  • Explore the mysterious Skull Canyon and interact with its unusual inhabitants.

  • Investigate the growing tensions between the NCR Rangers and the mutants.

  • Choose a side and/or help resolve the dispute.

 

This PDF requires the core rules found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook but could be played using the rules and pregen characters found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Starter Set.

americancivillibertiesunion.description_text:
Donations to support the American Civil Liberties Union Foundation, Inc. (ACLU) are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

For nearly 100 years, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) has been our nation's guardian of liberty, working in courts, legislatures, and communities to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties that the Constitution and the laws of the United States guarantee everyone in this country. Whether it's achieving full equality for LGBT people, establishing new privacy protections for our digital age of widespread government surveillance, ending mass incarceration, or preserving the right to vote or the right to have an abortion, the ACLU takes up the toughest civil liberties cases and issues to defend all people from government abuse and overreach. With more than 2 million members, activists, and supporters, the ACLU is a nationwide organization that fights tirelessly in all 50 states, Puerto Rico, and Washington, D.C., to safeguard everyone's rights.

falloutfactions_nukaworkquickstart_april.human_name: Fallout: Factions - 'Welcome to Nuka-World' Quickstart - PDF FREE
falloutfactions_nukaworkquickstart_april.description_text:
WELCOME TO NUKA-WORLD!

 

Fallout: Factions is an action-packed, competitive tabletop skirmish game in which players command a Crew of hardened Wasteland warriors. Of course, the game is based on Bethesda's genre-defining video games. 

 

In Fallout: Factions, you and your opponent will fight it out on your tabletop, making tactical decisions and relying on dice rolls to determine the outcome of your attacks. Each time you play, you tell the next chapter of your Crew’s story, charting their journey from wide-eyed nobodies to Wasteland Legends!

 

This FREE 16-page quickstart is designed to provide a gameplay demo and walk you through a round of play. The aim isn’t to teach you all the rules in detail but to show you the basics and give you a feel for the game so you can start reading the complete rulebook armed with a little context!

 

Two Crew rosters and the demo rules are included. In this quickstart, you can play through the demo with a friend or take the reins of both Crews, switching back and forth each turn.

 

You will also need

 

  • A handful of d10s

  • A tape measure or ruler measured in inches

  • Ten miniatures (Some suggestions here!)

  • A few coins or bottle caps to use as tokens

  • Some wargaming terrain (or whatever you have at hand)

fallout_wastelandwarfare_rpgpdfexpansion.description_text:
TABLETOP ROLEPLAYING IN THE WASTELAND!

 

Designed for 1 Gamemaster and up to 6 players, aged 14 and up.

 

The Fallout: Wasteland Warfare roleplaying game builds on the narrative wargame experience of the tabletop miniatures game and will include new rules for character creation and creating adventures in the wasteland.  

 

Delve into abandoned Vaults, ruined cities, strange facilities, and antiquated military bases. Encounter Super Mutants, Raiders, Survivors, Vault Dwellers, the Brotherhood of Steel, the Institute and the Enclave, and many more! Will you roam wide and far, or build up and protect your settlement? For those who want to create your own unique characters or use the faction based Archetype cards to start your own hero and see them grow from adventure to adventure. 

 

Includes:

 

  • Complete rules for tabletop roleplaying in the wasteland, based on the popular Fallout: Wasteland Warfare miniatures game.

  • Full rules for character creation, archetypes and original player ideas alongside existing characters from the Fallout

  • Packed with lots of full colour photographic scenes of the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare range to inspire your adventures!

  • Interact with familiar characters and creatures drawn from the world of

  • Background on the locations, adversaries and factions that players can encounter.

  • 3 free adventures totalling 26 pages in a linked campaign or for use as one-shot missions to support GM's

  • Guidance for players to build their settlement as a base of operations

  • Advice and tools to help GM's create and run exciting new adventures in the Fallout 

 

Can be played as a standalone product using free downloadable cards, plus the Wasteland Warfare dice from Modiphius.

developers.developer-name: James Sheahan, Jim Johnson, James Barry, Richard L. Gale, Jim Johnson, Ryan Schoon, Federico Sohns, Jon Webb, Sam Webb

pdffallout_therpg_adventure2_fullyoperat.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game - Fully Operational (PDF)
pdffallout_therpg_adventure2_fullyoperat.description_text:
Scavenging Run!

Few tools of pre-War America have developed as much notoriety across the Wasteland as a fully operational suit of Power Armor, a symbol of status, of wealth, and strength. Most wastelanders would give their last cap, sell out a friend, or even kill to get their hands on a set.

In this digital adventure for Fallout The Roleplaying Game, a former Brotherhood of Steel Scribe has identified the location of a previously-undiscovered West-Tek facility. Rumour has it that they may have been developing prototype Power Armor and other tech, but the site  has been lost since the bombs fell. A journey through the Wasteland is likely to be fraught with danger, but this is a prime opportunity for a scavenging run that simply can’t be passed up. You’ll have to head out to investigate, but it had better be worth the risk…

The Fully Operational PDF features:

  • A 23-page adventure in three acts for character levels 16-20.
  • An abandoned West-Tek facility to explore.
  • Several departments to scavenge including: Manufacturing, Weapons Testing, and Research and Design.
  • New tech to discover and decisions to be made about its future.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_intothevault_pd.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Into the Vault - PDF
fallout_wastelandwarfare_intothevault_pd.description_text:
Project Safehouse, Vault-Tec’s programme of huge underground bunkers, was on paper a scheme to protect and preserve America and its citizens were global nuclear war ever to break out. However, a dark secret lay behind the development. Most Vaults held deeper, sinister purposes with twisted science being performed on the unwilling inhabitants who had made it to the various shelters as the bombs fell October 23, 2077.

 

Now these Vaults lay scattered across the Wasteland, some open to the brave or foolish adventurer who would plumb their depths, others sealed tight awaiting some unknown signal to roll back the doors and reveal the horrors within.

 

Into the Vault is a digital expansion for Fallout: Wasteland Warfare that provides players with new rules to venture into the darkness of the Wasteland’s underground Vaults. Enter a new arena of perils and challenges to fight battles in close confines and narrow passageways.

 

The Into the Vault PDF expansion features new scenarios and printable cards that allow players to generate corridors and intersections of an underground battlefield. It also allows players to generate random encounters with enemies as they explore each section of the Vault.

 

This PDF expansion includes:

 

  • A 22-page digital booklet with all the new rules needed to play the Into the Vault expansion.

  • 38 printable PDF cards representing different sections of the Vault.

  • New rules and scenarios for fighting battles within underground environments.

  • Rules for generating random encounters with enemies.

 

©2022 Bethesda Softworks, a ZeniMax Media company. All Rights Reserved.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_printandplay_hi.description_text:
NB This is a high resolution print file of Beta card sets – players may need to alter/resize these cards to a more print-friendly. These cards are offered as free downloads to allow players to get started with the free downloadable version of the rules, and are not specifically designed for multi-printings. Please choose ‘Print actual size’ in printer options to print correctly.

 

In Fallout: Wasteland Warfare players build their own crew from a wide range of factions, allies and iconic characters from the Fallout series, and play in post-apocalyptic games of 3 - 30 high quality 32mm scale miniatures through a huge variety of iconic scenery and settlement buildings, from the Red Rocket to Sanctuary Hills, Nuka-Cola vending machines and wrecked cars. 

 

This PDF contains high resolution printable cards for use with Fallout: Wasteland Warfare. This gives players an interim version of some of the cards that come with the 2 player starter set for Fallout: Wasteland Warfare, and includes:

 

- Unit cards for Survivors and Super Mutants that come with the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare 2 player starter set, letting players get to grips with the wasteland and try out the game

 

- A range of leader cards to customise your heroic characters in combat

 

- Equipment and weapons to load up your force with ready for your first skirmishes with the foe

 

These cards are a Beta version of those available with the 2 player starter set for Fallout: Wasteland Warfare. They are designed for print and play only, and are not for use in tournament, competitive or event play. Card details may change at any time.

 

This is a free download. This PDF is not a complete game, and requires the Core Rulebook PDF (free to download) to play. It is recommended that players also download the ‘Getting Acclimated’ learning to play guide (also free to download). 

 

AI and some other card sets are not included. These require the Scenario book and 2 player starter set to play (available for purchase separately), which includes AI play, Settlement Mode play, Narrative scenarios, linked scenarios and more.

In Fallout: Wasteland Warfare players build their own crew from a wide range of factions, allies and iconic characters from the Fallout series, and play in post-apocalyptic games of 3 - 30 high quality 32mm scale miniatures through a huge variety of iconic scenery and settlement buildings, from the Red Rocket to Sanctuary Hills, Nuka-Cola vending machines and wrecked cars.

fallout_factionsbattlefornuka-worldstart.human_name: Fallout: Factions "Battle for Nuka-World" Starter Set - Digital Rulebook
fallout_factionsbattlefornuka-worldstart.description_text:
“Hey there New Meat, you ready to start carvin’ out yer own slice of this here Wasteland? Of course you are, look at that bloodthirsty little mug. Well, you’ve come to the right place, here in Nuka-World we’ve got all the carnage a Raider-to-be could ever need. Two gangs are chomping at the bit to take a big bite out of the other, just to prove who’s the biggest threat! I ain’t picking a side, but you better, so get in there, grab a gun, and let's see what happens! One way or the other, it’s gunna be a good show!”

 

Welcome to

Fallout: Factions

, the new

Fallout

Miniatures Skirmish game from Modiphius and acclaimed game designer James Hewitt! In

Fallout: Factions

, you lead your own gang of Raiders through the ruins of Nuka-World, cutting the competition out of your territory and watching your Scavvers, Psychos and more grow and change with every scrap. 

© 2023 Bethesda Softworks LLC. FALLOUT and related logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of ZeniMax Media Inc. or its affiliates in the U.S. and/or other countries. All Rights Reserved.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_libertyprimerul.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Liberty Prime Rules Expansion PDF
fallout_wastelandwarfare_libertyprimerul.description_text:
Liberty Prime–a 40-foot tall robot and decimating weapons platform which lay dormant throughout the Great War. 200 years later, the East Coast Brotherhood of Steel rediscovered it and spent almost two decades attempting to restore and reactivate its systems. Liberty Prime was eventually brought online and deployed against the Enclave in what would become known as the Battle of Project Purity. The Brotherhood of Steel later launched the Mk II version to lay siege to the Institute of the Commonwealth. How will you deploy Liberty Prime in your games?

 

This booklet provides rules for using Liberty Prime on the battlefields of Fallout: Wasteland Warfare.

 

  • All the rules for running Liberty Prime as a player- or AI-controlled unit

  • 14 print-and-play cards

  • 3 Scenarios specifically for use with Liberty Prime

fallout_wastelandwarfare_unexpectedsheph.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - The Unexpected Shepherd Part 2 PDF
fallout_wastelandwarfare_unexpectedsheph.description_text:
PART 2: DANGEROUS TRAILS

 

This is a 40 page Solo adventure PDF for the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG Expansion. You will receive the PDF immediately on purchase.

 

Delve into the Wasteland with the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG’s Solo missions! This is the second part of the adventure, and you must have played the first part to continue your character’s adventure. The decisions you made in part 1 continue to matter through part 2, but the outcome is still up to you.

 

The story picks up right where part 1 ended, as you are drawn to leave the settlement of Century, to provide safe escort across the wasteland. Your choices and actions will decide how successful you are in completing that mission and surviving all that the Wasteland has to throw at you.

 

Using a choose-a-path style adventure system, you get to make choices, make skill tests and decide the outcome. The Unexpected Shepherd also uses special game mechanics to remember some of your actions so they may have consequences later, as well as track time; plus, you can play major encounters using models on the table using Fallout: Wasteland Warfare’s AI system to control the non-player characters.

 

For more details on The Unexpected Shepherd project, check out our Part 1 blog about the exciting features it contains.

 

To play The Unexpected Shepherd you will require access to the Fallout: Wasteland Warfare RPG Expansion.

 

©2022 Bethesda Softworks, a ZeniMax Media company. All Rights Reserved.

 

DRTPG: 

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/405550

fallout_wastelandwarfare_gettingacclimat.description_text:
In Fallout: Wasteland Warfare players build their own crew from a wide range of factions, allies and iconic characters from the Fallout series, and play in post-apocalyptic games of 3 - 30 high quality 32mm scale miniatures through a huge variety of iconic scenery and settlement buildings, from the Red Rocket to Sanctuary Hills, Nuka-Cola vending machines and wrecked cars. 

 

This PDF gives new players and brand new wargamers a step by step guide to Fallout: Wasteland Warfare and the basic game mechanics you’ll need to play. It includes:

 

 - Basic Scenarios to get you started

 

 - A clear phase by phase guide to the core rules of the game

 

 - Explanations of terms in the game that may be confusing to brand new wargamers.

 

This PDF is complimented with the Core Rules PDF (also free to download) which will be needed to fully use the ‘Getting Acclimated’ document, and the Scenario book which includes AI play, Settlement Mode play, Narrative scenarios, linked scenarios and more, (available for purchase separately).

 

DTRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/237126

fallout2d20_npcpack3_reillysrangers.description_text:
Luck and Hope in the Wasteland

 

Mercenaries with a moral compass are uncommon in the Wasteland, so it was a surprise when Reilly’s Rangers made such a name for themselves. With clovers and sabres worn proudly on their chests and geomapper modules in hand, they make a steady living helping the people of the Wasteland for an appropriate fee. They are an efficient, tight-knit group that pack some serious firepower, so if you’re one of those rare individuals with both caps and moral scruples, look no further than Reilly’s Rangers.

 

This digital NPC Theme Pack for Fallout The Roleplaying Game is designed to give gamemasters all the necessary rules, stats, and tools to introduce Reilly’s Rangers into their games. Use the information within to present these NPCs as potential allies, build a quest around their contracts past or present, or perhaps use them as a stand-in for another well-armed mercenary or military group. 

 

The characters in this NPC Pack are presented at “Day 0” of their respective Fallout game, allowing you to take the Rangers anywhere you want. These NPCs are best suited to fight alongside Level 10 player characters but you can, of course, modify them and the content of this PDF to suit your own game.

 

The 22-page Reilly’s Rangers PDF features:

 

  • Stat blocks and roster for five named Reilly’s Rangers NPCs (Reilly, Butcher, Donovan, Brick, and Theo), plus two stat blocks for probationary Rangers. 

  • Information on the group’s reputation and activities, plus tips on their combat tactics.

  • 6 Plot Seeds to introduce Reilly’s Rangers into your games.

  • A detailed write-up of the Rangers’ Compound, with loot and clearance rewards.

  • New equipment used by the Rangers, including a weapon mod, weapons, and armor.

 

© 2024 ZeniMax Media Inc. All Rights Reserved.

 

DRTPG: 

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/483555

fallout_wastelandwarfare_printathome_bas.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Print at Home - Basing Greebles: Slabs & Stones
fallout_wastelandwarfare_printathome_bas.description_text:
War never changes… but your builds can with this pack of multiple slab- and stone-themed greebles!

 

This 3D print product lets you print 10 themed greebles to add to your bases, builds, and terrain to help create immersive tabletop scenes. Some of these parts could also be used as objective markers or loot and most are ubiquitous across the wasteland and could be found anywhere! This pack is also available as part of the Basing Greebles Bundle.

 

Files have been pre-hollowed where possible, and all files include supported versions for easier printing.

 

Contents 

 

  • Slabs & Stones 1-10

fallout_wastelandwarfare_printathome_cor.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Print At Home - Corvega Atomic V8 Sedan
fallout_wastelandwarfare_printathome_cor.description_text:
The Corvega Atomic V8 Sedan was manufactured by Chryslus Motors before the war. This classic vehicle can be found scattered throughout the suburbs and highways of Boston and across the wider Wasteland.

 

Driven by a small fusion engine, stray shots risk detonating the rusting remains of these vehicles so caution when exploring is advised. 

 

This 3D print product lets you print the Sedan with inflated and deflated wheels and with a fully detailed interior if preferred. 

 

The set contains terrain that has been pre-supported for easier printing.

 

Contents 

 

  • Sedan

  • Sedan with interior details

 

DRTPG: 

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/379744

fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Terrain Expansion: Vault Tec Office Bundle STL
fallout_wastelandwarfare_terrainexpansio.description_text:
Friend, where will you and your loved ones be when the bombs fall? Secure their future the way you want with a state-of-the-art underground vault from Vault-Tec!

 

You have been chosen as the designer of this critical structure, and with the Vault Walls Upgrade Pack you’ll have all you need to expand your vault with new options for walls and scenery which build on the existing Vault Design Starter Pack, Vault Walls Upgrade Pack and Vault Tech Atirum Pack.

 

Will you create spacious avenues and living spaces for the survivors to-be, or will you further the causes of science by limiting access to unnecessary luxuries such as food, water, and oxygen?

 

Build your own Vault-Tec Vault with the STL design files, ready to be the background for epic and immersive games of Fallout: Wasteland Warfare and its RPG Expansion.

 

This Vault Atrium Pack includes files for Heavy Duty Consoles, Modular Shelving, Crates and miscellanous items, giving players huge amounts of versatility and variation to build their own vault.

 

Includes:

 

STL printable files for:

 

  • Heavy Duty Consoles

  • Modular Shelving

  • Crates

  • Miscellanous items (see pics for contents)

fallout_theroleplayinggamewanderersguide.human_name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Wanderers Guide Book (PDF)
fallout_theroleplayinggamewanderersguide.description_text:
Explore the Unknown!

 

Journeying through the devastated wasteland, resourceful wanderers from all walks of life travel from settlement to settlement in order to survive and, sometimes, even thrive! Now, the Wanderer’s Guide Book for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game gives you new tools to create wanderer characters, equip them with weapons and vehicles, and send them into the wasteland to face deadly new adversaries.

 

The Wanderer’s Guide Book includes a wealth of content for both players and gamemasters. If you want new character origins, perks, and equipment, you’ll find them here. If you want quick and easy scavenging locations, look no further! But watch out for the expansive bestiary full of creatures and factions that make the wasteland so dangerous.

 

Within the 236-page Wanderer’s Guide Book PDF you will:

 

  • Create new characters from brand new origins, including the Brotherhood Outcast, Child of Atom, Nightkin, robots, and more!

  • Scavenge anywhere in the Wasteland with pre-built locations or use them to create your own! Spend your Luck for chances at more loot!

  • Get ahead of the competition with 54 brand new perks. Become fireproof, fight like a gladiator, work those healing hands, or become a natural born survivor. Remind everyone why you’re SPECIAL.

  • Loads of new equipment just waiting to be found in the Wasteland! Create your own legendary weapons and armor!

  • Introducing vehicles and new rules to tear across the Wastes! Roll in style in a Chryslus Cherry Bomb or soar the skies in a Vertibird.

  • Create unforgettable legendary foes and creatures with new optional rules. Evolve your enemies with new legendary abilities that mutate as the fight goes on!

  • Face off against a myriad of new creatures and foes from cryptids, mutated experiments, and iconic factions across the East and West coasts.

 

This book requires the core rules found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook.

 

© 1997-2024 Bethesda Softworks LLC, a ZeniMax Media company. Bethesda Softworks, ZeniMax and related logos are registered trademarks or trademarks of ZeniMax Media Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. Fallout and related logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Bethesda Softworks LLC in the U.S. and/or other countries. All Rights Reserved.

fallout_wastelandwarfare_printathome_bro.human_name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare - Print at Home - Brotherhood of Steel Encampment STL
fallout_wastelandwarfare_printathome_bro.description_text:
Many divisions of the Brotherhood of Steel are entrenched in incredibly secure bunkers, but their mission to preserve pre-war technologies often requires them to leave their headquarters and head out into the Wasteland. Major field operations will require a forward expeditionary camp where Knights and Scribes can work to retrieve discovered tech, while safely defended by heavily armed and armoured Paladins. Such camps are routinely fortified with lookout platforms, mechanised turrets, and barricades of all kinds.  The Brotherhood of Steel is a well-oiled military machine and their camps are no exception. 

 

Heavy-duty tents might be a poor substitute for the security of thick concrete walls, but they will easily serve as temporary barracks and command posts for the duration of the field mission. Infirmaries will also be required in the event of conflict with locals who might be in possession of the very technology the Brotherhood wants to reclaim. Evidence of previous conflicts may lie nearby, along with the corpses of long-dead soldiers who once bore the technology that the Brotherhood has decided to reclaim. 

 

This 3D print product lets you print multiple pieces of scatter to help create immersive tabletop scenes. They could also be used to build defensible positions, dig sites, camping grounds, or to flesh out more densely populated areas. Although designed with the Brotherhood of Steel in mind, these items can easily be used or repurposed by any faction of the Wasteland.

 

Files have been pre-hollowed where possible, and all files include supported versions for easier printing.

americancivillibertiesunion.description_text:
Donations to support the American Civil Liberties Union Foundation, Inc. (ACLU) are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

For nearly 100 years, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) has been our nation's guardian of liberty, working in courts, legislatures, and communities to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties that the Constitution and the laws of the United States guarantee everyone in this country. Whether it's achieving full equality for LGBT people, establishing new privacy protections for our digital age of widespread government surveillance, ending mass incarceration, or preserving the right to vote or the right to have an abortion, the ACLU takes up the toughest civil liberties cases and issues to defend all people from government abuse and overreach. With more than 2 million members, activists, and supporters, the ACLU is a nationwide organization that fights tirelessly in all 50 states, Puerto Rico, and Washington, D.C., to safeguard everyone's rights.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Fallout Tabletop Mega Bundle by Modiphius
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Fallout: Wasteland Warfare – Rules of Play, Fallout: Wasteland Warfare – Campaign Book, Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook PDF, Fallout: The Roleplaying Game: Winter of Atom PDF, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Already played every Fallout game? All caught up with the TV show? You can bring the Wasteland right to your living room with this Fallout tabletop roleplaying bundle from Modiphius! You’ll get rulebooks, supplemental materials, and 3D printer files for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, Fallout: Wasteland Warfare, Fallout: Factions, and more—all the ingredients to set up your vision of Fallout’s post-apocalyptic future. Whether you’re a Vault Dweller, a Ghoul, or suited up with the Brotherhood of Steel, you’ll have everything you need to create your own adventure! Every purchase of this bundle at the price of your choice gets you a one-way ticket to the Wasteland and supports the ACLU!
from_bundle.author: Modiphius

aicustomersupportagent_n8nworkflowfirst-.human_name: AI Customer Support Agent - n8n Workflow (First-Time Exclusive Humble Bundle Release)
aicustomersupportagent_n8nworkflowfirst-.description_text:
Automate your customer support pipeline with this AI-powered n8n Customer Support Agent, designed to classify, respond to, and log incoming tickets with zero manual effort. This workflow intelligently analyzes each message using an LLM, determines whether it can be handled automatically or needs escalation, and drafts clear, friendly support replies that match real-world customer service standards. Routine questions are handled instantly, while complex issues are safely routed to your team, saving hours every week without sacrificing quality.

✔️ Lifetime access

✔️ Source files included (JSON workflows to import into n8n)

Built entirely with n8n featuring Python (Native) and OpenAI, this workflow doubles as both a production-ready automation and a practical learning asset for AI-driven support systems. girlswhocode.description_text:
Donations to support Girls Who Code are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Girls Who Code, a nonprofit organization, was founded in 2012 to encourage more young women to complete a college-level computer science education and gain skills to further enhance their employability. Mobilizing leading executives, educators, and engineers, Girls Who Code has developed a new model of computer science education designed to inspire, educate, and equip girls of all experience levels and backgrounds with the skills to succeed in the field.

In just three years, Girls Who Code has already begun to move the needle: through rapid iteration and expansion of our Summer Immersion Program and highly-scalable Clubs Program, Girls Who Code has delivered 3,000+ hours of instruction to 3,000+ girls nationwide. Our programs have earned support from the CEOs of top Fortune 500 companies, engaged 700+ industry professionals, delivered among the most robust dataset on computer science education, and been featured in 100+ publications, from The New York Times to the Today Show. Our alumnae are overwhelmingly choosing to major in computer science or related studies and consistently name Girls Who Code's programs as their chief incentive to do so.

Girls Who Code is dedicated to closing the gender gap in the technology world. Supporting the work of Girls Who Code is an opportunity to empower the engineers, innovators, and executives of tomorrow.

✔️ Source files included

Move beyond technical analysis into deep learning. Train your own financial AI models.

This video course shows you how to build a unified social media and content automation pipeline with n8n, letting you create once and distribute everywhere without copy pasting or third party schedulers.

  • Authenticate and automate posts to X (Twitter), LinkedIn, and Facebook pages.
  • Send simple, targeted Gmail campaigns directly from a Google Sheets list.
  • Chain workflows together to launch multi platform announcements from a single trigger.

✔️ Lifetime access

✔️ Source files included (JSON workflows to import into n8n)

Turn product launches, updates, and announcements into a one click workflow.

Create faster, stay consistent, and keep your brand visible automatically.
