metallicaandphilosophy_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Add a hard, industrial edge to your projects with METALLIC. This pack contains 50 sound effects, perfect for creating a powerful sense of force, impact, or mechanical movement. From the sharp clang of a sword hitting a shield and the creak of a rusty hinge to the heavy thud of a metal door and the sharp scrape of metal on stone, these sounds are designed to provide a realistic and immersive aural experience.

Ideal for medieval fantasy, sci-fi, or any project that needs the defining sound of metal.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/jmJ3mHpPrs0

fleshadblood_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Bring a horrifying, intimate realism to your projects with FLESH AND BLOOD. This pack contains 50 sound effects perfect for capturing the brutal, squishy sounds of gore and violence. From the wet tear of flesh and the sickening crack of bone to the squelch of a monster moving and the gurgle of blood, these sounds are designed to create a powerful, visceral sense of horror.

Ideal for horror games, cinematic fight scenes, or any project that needs to get up close and personal with the grisly reality of violence.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/GrQdwGgWbrk

dungeonatmosphere_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Set a chilling scene with DUNGEON ATMOSPHERE. This pack contains 14 looping sound effects, perfect for creating an immersive backdrop of cold stone, darkness, and dread. From the subtle drip of water and the creak of unseen chains to the hollow echoes and unsettling whispers, these sounds are designed to build a consistent sense of suspense and mystery.

Ideal for fantasy games, horror projects, or any scene that needs to feel like a timeless prison of stone.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/EItxxU9zJWs

lamentations_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Evoke a profound sense of sadness and despair with LAMENTATIONS. This pack contains 35 vocal sound effects, perfect for capturing moments of intense grief and emotional pain. From sorrowful sobs and heart-wrenching cries to pained groans and mournful whimpers, these sounds are designed to make your audience feel every moment of a character's deep sorrow.

Ideal for cinematic drama, emotional games, or any project that needs to convey a powerful and human sense of loss and suffering.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/1JInt2yz7-M

interface_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Give your digital projects a polished feel with INTERFACE. This pack contains 100 essential HUD and menu sounds, perfect for creating a responsive and immersive user experience. From satisfying button clicks and selection beeps to subtle data scans and pop-up effects, these sounds are ideal for video games, futuristic films, or interactive applications.

Each sound is designed to provide clear, satisfying feedback, making your interface feel intuitive, modern, and alive.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/SixE30f7_1Y

pixelexplosion_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
PIXEL EXPLOSION is a sound effects pack featuring 40 explosive 8-bit retro game sounds, inspired by classic arcade and pixel-era video games.

From short chiptune blasts and crunchy bit-crushed hits to power-up detonations and classic arcade-style explosions, this pack delivers instant nostalgia with high impact.

Perfect for retro games, pixel art projects, mobile games, trailers, UI effects, and chiptune music, these sounds add a fun, punchy, and authentic old-school vibe to any production.

chaos_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Bring a sense of overwhelming mayhem to your projects with CHAOS. This pack contains 49 sound effects, expertly crafted to create an atmosphere of total disorder and panic. From distorted impacts and unsettling drones to jarring musical hits and guttural screams, these sounds are designed to make your audience feel a powerful sense of tension and fear.

Ideal for horror films, action games, or any project that needs to capture the sound of pure, unbridled destruction.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/DOW1p_Vibvc

alienvoices_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Introduce the unsettling presence of extraterrestrial life with ALIEN VOICES. This pack contains 41 distinct alien sounds, perfect for giving a unique voice to creatures from another world. From strange, guttural chattering to high-pitched, otherworldly screeches and chilling telepathic whispers, these sounds are ideal for creating a truly alien and unpredictable atmosphere.

Whether you're scoring a sci-fi game, a horror film, or a cosmic thriller, this pack provides the definitive sounds of a life form beyond our understanding.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/UhmJittzMg8

rip_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Add a savage, primal intensity to your projects with RIP CLAWS. This pack contains 15 sound effects of flesh tearing and claws ripping, perfect for moments of brutal combat or animalistic attack. From the sickening rip of a blade through flesh to the sharp tear of a monster's claws, these sounds are designed to create a visceral and horrifyingly realistic aural experience.

Ideal for horror games, cinematic fight scenes, or any project that needs to capture the sound of a truly brutal, physical struggle.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/UibNz4UkmcU

agony_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Bring a visceral sense of suffering to your projects with AGONY. This pack contains 29 sound effects of a man in distress, perfect for capturing moments of intense pain, torture, and despair. From sharp gasps and strained groans to agonizing screams and chilling whimpers, these sounds are designed to make your audience feel every moment of the character's torment.

Ideal for horror games, cinematic torture scenes, or any project that needs to evoke a powerful and disturbing sense of human suffering.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/JxgpPVA0WCI

birds_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Bring the natural world to your projects with BIRDS. This pack contains 25 sound effects of various birds, perfect for creating a vibrant and realistic outdoor ambiance. From the cheerful chirping of small songbirds and the gentle cooing of doves to the sharp caw of a crow and the powerful shriek of a hawk, these sounds are designed to add life and detail to your scenes.

Ideal for films, games, or any project that needs the definitive sound of the feathered world.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/oiuH_ihys-c

crackingvinyl_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Add a warm, nostalgic texture to your projects with CRACKING VINYL. This pack contains 20 sound effects of an old vinyl record, perfect for evoking a sense of time, memory, or a classic, vintage feel. From the subtle crackle of the needle on the groove to the deeper pops and hums of an aged disc, these sounds are designed to provide a rich, authentic backdrop.

Ideal for cinematic flashbacks, stylish video games, or any project that needs the definitive, comforting sound of a retro record.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/_F6saYOvFT0

pixeldarkvol1_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Get access to 140 retro game music short sequences, specially designed to help you create your own original tracks for all your creative projects.

Each sequence is delivered in high-quality WAV and MIDI formats, giving you full freedom to edit, rearrange, and adapt the music to your needs — whether for games, videos, trailers, or interactive experiences. Perfect for composers, game developers, and content creators looking for an authentic retro game sound with maximum flexibility.

witch_darkfantasystudio.description_text:
Bring a sense of ancient, dark magic to your projects with WITCH. This pack contains 50 sound effects, perfect for adding an eerie, mystical presence to your scenes. From the crackle of a potion brewing and the bubbling of a cauldron to the sharp sound of a spell being cast and the unsettling whisper of a hex, these sounds are designed to evoke a powerful, supernatural atmosphere.

Ideal for fantasy games, horror films, or any project that needs the definitive sound of witchcraft.

WAVE/ STEREO. Preview here: https://youtu.be/WJgLbg2Xb2M

littlekidsrock.description_text:
Donations to support Musci Will are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Music Will runs the largest nonprofit music program in the US public school system. Our teachers currently serve over 500,000 students in more than 600 cities and towns across the country.

We believe that music education is a right, not a privilege, and it should reflect the cultures of the students it serves.

That’s why, for two decades now, our programs have taught students such popular American genres as rock, pop, R&B, Latin, rap and country—alongside styles already taught in schools, such as classical and jazz.

Today, a national network of K-12 districts has adopted the Music Will program as their own.

More than 70 colleges and universities now teach our approach to their music education majors. Several state departments of education have partnered with Music Will to grow music education in the schools they serve.

Our mission of transforming lives by transforming music education has grown into a movement.

from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with the Noise Alchemy SFX Bundle. Plus, Humble members gain exclusive access to a one-year subscription to Noise Alchemy, the number one online sound effect creation platform! Pay what you want for a massive concoction of can’t-miss SFX assets, and help support Music Will with your purchase.

basic_data.human_name: SPRINGFLING 2026 Physical Tabletop RPG Core Book Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Make some space on your bookshelves, because we’ve got a very special book bundle for all the TTRPG enthusiasts out there: a library of physical copies of roleplaying game rulebooks to kick off your next tabletop adventure! Hunt down replicants and have an existential crisis or two in Blade Runner The Roleplaying Game! Save the Mortal Realms from the evil Nagash in Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound! Master the arts of elemental bending and unite the Four Nations in Avatar Legends: The Roleplaying Game! Grab this collection of roleplaying tomes while you can, and support the ACLU with every purchase at the price of your choice!

Limited Quantities Available! In the US Only.

Keys expire, redeem before March 31st, 2026. Items ship from the Magpie Games Store after March 1st.

Master the arts of elemental bending and unite the Four Nations in Avatar Legends: The Roleplaying Game! americancivillibertiesunion.description_text:
Donations to support the American Civil Liberties Union Foundation, Inc. (ACLU) are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

For nearly 100 years, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) has been our nation's guardian of liberty, working in courts, legislatures, and communities to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties that the Constitution and the laws of the United States guarantee everyone in this country. Whether it's achieving full equality for LGBT people, establishing new privacy protections for our digital age of widespread government surveillance, ending mass incarceration, or preserving the right to vote or the right to have an abortion, the ACLU takes up the toughest civil liberties cases and issues to defend all people from government abuse and overreach. With more than 2 million members, activists, and supporters, the ACLU is a nationwide organization that fights tirelessly in all 50 states, Puerto Rico, and Washington, D.C., to safeguard everyone's rights.

warhammerageofsigmar_soulbound_physical.description_text:
Dive into perilous action and explore the Mortal Realms in the official roleplaying game for Warhammer Age of Sigmar. Answer the call of the gods! Become Soulbound and save the people of the realms from the ruinous forces of chaos, death and destruction!

Your characters are tied together by divine purpose and infused with the power of the gods. As a beacon of hope for the people of the Mortal Realms you will spend the rest of your days in a struggle for survival against the most hideous and corrupt evils the realms have ever known. You will risk your life to explore the eight perilous realms, protect the cities of Sigmar, and delve into forgotten tombs and lost Stormvaults in search of ancient relics and power.

Together you will face down roving bands of orruks and ogres, legions of undead ghouls and spectres, and hordes of otherworldly daemons in a desperate struggle for survival. Slay your foes and return hope to the doomed realms.

Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound contains 13 thrilling chapters of rules and content to sink your teeth into, including:

  • The complete C7D6 Rules system.
  • Begin your adventure as one of 23 Archetypes, or create a character from scratch.
  • Outfit your characters with unique Equipment, Skills and Talents.
  • Take advantage of Endeavours to grow your character between adventures.
  • A complete overview of The Mortal Realms, from the Eight Realmspheres, the gods who rule over them, the magic within and the people who live and survive there.
  • A deep dive into the Great Parch, a continent of fire and ash found in the Realm of Aqshy, the perfect place to kick off your adventures!
  • Advice and guidance for GMs, including a full Bestiary that draws on the forces of Chaos, Death, and Destruction.

developers.developer-name: Ryan Costello, Ben Heisler, Paige Leitman

bladerunnertheroleplayinggame_physical.description_text: The official Blade Runner RPG propels you into the streets of Los Angeles as Blade Runners with unique specialties, personalities – and memories. The game pushes the boundaries of investigative gameplay in tabletop RPGs, giving you a range of tools to solve an array of cases far beyond retiring Replicants. Beyond the core casework, the game showcases the key themes of Blade Runner – sci-fi action, corporate intrigue, existential character drama, and moral conflict. It challenges you to question your friends, empathize with your enemies, and explore the poisons and perseverance of hope and humanity during inhumane times

ageofvikings_physical.description_text: Hear the call of glory and honor, journey proud across your land free from the tyranny of kings and queens—enter the Age of Vikings! In the Age of Vikings roleplaying game, you are transported to medieval Iceland—a vibrant land on the edge of the known world, where Vikings seek honor and fame through adventure. Age of Vikings is a standalone game built with Chaosium’s Basic Roleplaying: Universal Game Engine. This rulebook contains the Hero creation rules, including Passions, family history, and ever-important Icelandic nicknames. The book also has rules for the Basic Roleplaying system as used in Age of Vikings, including skills, conflict resolution, and hero development. Take to the frigid seas with extensive rules for ships and seafaring, including naval combat—No other roleplaying game so effortlessly thrusts you into one of the most fabled cultures and time periods in history!

avatarlegends_theroleplayinggame_physica.description_text:
Avatar Legends: The Roleplaying Game brings you and your friends into the beloved setting of Avatar Legends—as new heroes of your own stories! Weave tales of self-discovery and action with your team of friends, and go penguin-sledding while you're at it!

In this RPG, you might face off with the Triple Threat Triad in Republic City, travel through a spirit portal to rescue a missing child, negotiate peace between Earth Kingdom outlaws, pursue enemies through the Four Nations, and even learn a thing or two from beloved Avatar Legends characters.

  • Choose a setting amid the eras of Kyoshi, Roku, the Hundred Year War, Aang, and Korra.
  • Create your heroes from 10 playbooks—archetypes that help you play compelling protagonists.
  • Master an element, weaponry, or technology to rise and meet your destiny.
  • Pursue balance by learning from great mentors and getting into trouble across the Four Nations.

developers.developer-name: Sharang Biswas, Elizabeth Chaipraditkul, Brendan Conway, James Mendez Hodes, Yeonsoo Julian Kim, Simon Moody, Lysa Penrose, Mark Diaz Truman

gijoeroleplayinggamecorerulebook_physica.human_name: G.I. JOE Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook
gijoeroleplayinggamecorerulebook_physica.description_text:
In the G.I. JOE Roleplaying game, create your own Joe by choosing your military training origin, personal traits, and role within the G.I. Joe organization to become a Real American Hero and save the day!

This book contains everything you need to create your own G.I. JOE character and play the game - just add dice, some friends, and your imagination.

Features:

  • Create your own unique G.I. JOE character
  • Full rulebook for running your own G.I. JOE Roleplaying Game
  • One Gamemaster leads the story with a group of players
  • Contains introductory adventure for new team
  • Full color hardcover book with 352 pages with ribbon bookmark

developers.developer-name: Ryan Costello, Ben Heisler, Paige Leitman

dune_theroleplayinggame_physical.description_text:
The Dune: Adventures in the Imperium roleplaying game takes you into a far future beyond anything you have imagined, where fear is the mind killer so be sure to keep your wits about you. The Imperium is a place of deadly duels, feudal politics, and mysterious abilities, noble Houses politic constantly for power, influence, and vengeance in a universe where a blade can change the fortunes of millions. Build your House, carve your place in the universe or rebuild an ancient lineage and fight for the Imperial throne.

Take your characters on a journey through the storied worlds of Frank Herbert's sci-fi masterpiece, inhabit elite agents working for noble Houses where Mentats, Swordmasters, Spies, Bene Gesserit Sisters, Devious Advisors, or even desert Fremen join together to follow your banner.

developers.developer-name: Nathan Dowdell, Richard August, Simon Berman, Banana Chan, Jason Durall, Khaldoun Khelil, Helena Nash, Andrew Peregrine, Hilary Sklar, Chris Spivey, Mari Tokuda, Rachel Wilkinson, Ben Woerner

For nearly 100 years, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) has been our nation's guardian of liberty, working in courts, legislatures, and communities to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties that the Constitution and the laws of the United States guarantee everyone in this country. Whether it's achieving full equality for LGBT people, establishing new privacy protections for our digital age of widespread government surveillance, ending mass incarceration, or preserving the right to vote or the right to have an abortion, the ACLU takes up the toughest civil liberties cases and issues to defend all people from government abuse and overreach. With more than 2 million members, activists, and supporters, the ACLU is a nationwide organization that fights tirelessly in all 50 states, Puerto Rico, and Washington, D.C., to safeguard everyone's rights.

Included are 15 books covering a range of topics that’ll boost your qualifications and hone your skillset in security, containerization, version control, and much more. Pay what you want for the knowledge and confidence to succeed in a collection of in-demand disciplines, and help support Code for America with your purchase.
